Entire show with Yahuba Garcia on percussion 

* Ryan solo 
^ Ryan, Matt and James only 
~ Ryan, Matt and Larry trio 
 --Show Notes-- 
- It was 3 full sets and a lot of good ol&#039; times for all on hand at The Electric Company this New Year&#039;s, non-excluding the band. Can&#039;t say that 12.31.06 will earn them a medal for tightness but hey, we were all there to have fun, and let&#039;s just say that everyone passed. If you were in attendance, then this recording&#039;s definitely for you. 
- Debut of &#039;Jungle Love&#039; cover originally by Morris Day & The Time. 
- The guy leading the drunken &#039;God Bless America&#039; sing-a-long was a local character whose name sounds like "Rainbow Young" as far as I can tell from the recording, but never attempted to confirm with Zee.
